text.name: longdescription
text.text: The Sinclair QL (Quantum Leap) PC launched as an upper-end counterpart to the ZX Spectrum. Was aimed at the serious home user, pro and exec users markets. Small to medium-sized businesses and higher educational establishments. CPU Motorola 68008 @7.5 MHz Memory 128-896KB, OS Sinclair QDOS, SuperBASIC. Release date: 12 Jan '84.
